string.name: name
string.value: Knowledge about the Dragon 2
You obtained #t4161050#. #b#p1013000##k seems really curious about its contents...
#p1013000# is very excited about the book possibly containing information about his race. #bRead the book and explain what it contains to #p1013000##k.

#p1013000# appears to be a very special dragon called the Onyx Dragon. The explanation about a pact being necessary seems to confirm it. But it also says that the Onyx Dragons became extinct a long time ago...
Master, master! Did you find the book on Dragons? Do you think the book has information on my race?\r\n#L0##bI'm sure of it!#l\n#k
I... I agree... But why am I getting so nervous? I've never seen any other Dragons before. I wonder if there are pictures?\r\n#L0##bIf we discover where your race lives, want to go visit?#l\n#k
Huh? Really?\r\n#L0##bSure! We should go visit if we find out where they live. After all, they are your kin!#l\n#k
Really? You really promise to go with me, master? You promise? You can't take it back if you promise!\r\n#L0##bYes, hehe, I promise.#l\n#k
You promised! Yay, you are the best master ever! Now, open the book. See if you can find my race!
Psh, are you making fun of me right now, master? Stop messing with me and open the book! I'm getting antsy.

Did you find it? Did the book have any information on my race? Huh? Huh? Tell me, master! What type of Dragon am I?
#L0##bSerpent Dragon#l
#L1#Onyx Dragon#l
#L2#Mutant Dragon#l
#k

An Onyx Dragon? Wow, that sounds majestic! Haha, but of course! That's the race I belong to. So what are some characteristics of Onyx Dragons?
#L0##bThey become whole after they make a pact.#l
#L1#They are extremely strong and intelligent.#l
#L2#They have three heads.#l
#k

Ah, that's why I was able to meet you and awaken. Tell me more about the pact.
#L0##bIt's a slave pact, where the Dragon exploits a Human.#l
#L1#It's a marriage between a Dragon and a Human!#l
#L2#It's a bonding of spirit between a Human and a Dragon destined to enter that pact.#l
#k
More importantly, where do the Onyx Dragons live now? Where should we travel to meet my family of Onxy Dragons?!\r\n#L0##bWell...#l\n#k
Well what? Is that not in the book?\r\n#L0##bIt's in the book, but...#l\n#k
I don't get it. If it's in the book, how come you don't know where they are? Tell me, master!\r\n#L0##bThe... The Onyx Dragons have gone extinct...#l\n#k
What?! Extinct? No way... I'm still alive! I can't believe it. Did all of my family die? Then who am I? I don't understand.
Ugh, nothing is certain. It's just a book, right? It doesn't mean it has to be true! Let's keep searching for information on Dragons, master! I am determined to find my race!
A Serpent Dragon? Hm, that doesn't sound familiar at all. Are you sure, master? Check again!
Mu... Mutant?! I'm a Mutant? Am I really a Mutant Dragon?
Ah, I'm as strong and intelligent as can be because I'm an Onyx Dragon! Right?
Three heads...? But I only have one head! Will I grow two more when I'm older? Ewww, that's gross.
Oh, is that so? But I've never thought of you as a slave, master. Please, master... Don't leave me!
Marriage! Master! Are we in love? Shall I call you honey from now on?
